# Education

```{r}
tribble(
  ~ Degree, ~ Year, ~ Institution, ~ Where,
  "PhD Marine Science and Technology", "February 2012 - February 2024", "University of Massachusetts Amherst", "Amherst, MA",
  "MS Wildlife and Fisheries Conservation", "September 2008 - February 2012", "University of Massachusetts Amherst", "Amherst, MA",
  "BA English", "September 2003 - May 2007", "Connecticut College", "New London, CT"
) %>% 
  detailed_entries(Degree, Year, Institution, Where)
```

# Publications

all_pubs<- scholar::get_publications("-dn-gUsAAAAJ") %>%
